plugin._field_explanation: Scenery object that plays client-side animations in reaction to simple events.

_field_block_64.name: Animations#The animations this object will play in reaction to events.

_field_real.name: random start percent#0 to 1.0. Set to prevent objects animating in sync. The animation will start at a random point between 0 and the given value.

_field_short_integer.name: framerate:frames per second#0 defaults to 30 fps.

_field_char_enum.name: type#Animation type. Ambient plays on top of other animations.

_field_real.name: proximity distance:world units#How close a player must be to trigger a Proximity animation.

item.Name: halt Ambient animation during Damage animation
